verses.roman:
prabhu-pāśa āsi' sārvabhauma eka dina
yoḍa-hāta kari' kichu kaila nivedana

synonyms: prabhu-pāśa—in the presence of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āsi'-coming; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; eka dina—one day; yoḍa-hāta kari'-with folded hands; kichu—some; kaila—did; nivedana—submission.
translation: One day Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya came before Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu with folded hands and submitted a request.
